data.title: try cucumber ided tea
data.text:
This tea station has different taste iced tea.
Try cucumber ided tea and some snacks.
Their fried chicken is good for snacks. you have to wait 7minutes
but  very yummy combination

data.title: Great Drinks, Great Service
data.text: Second time coming to this place in weeks. I think this might be my "go to" place for tea. This place is a little pricier than other places, but you're actually getting tea in your drinks instead of sugar and milk. For both visits, we ordered the Oolong Milk Tea and the Fresh Taro Green Milk Tea. The oolong milk tea had a strong oolong taste and wasn't too sugary. The taro milk tea actually had pieces of taro inside instead of just using taro powder like at other tea places. They have a Top 5 drinks list posted on the board an from listening, it seemed pretty accurate. Lets talk service. Service is surprisingly quick. The first time we were there, it was 4 pm and no one was there. They had a 913 milk tea sample but the tea was out. We asked if we could try and they quickly made a fresh pot just for us. They even refilled our sample cups without us asking. Today was busy. We arrived around 12:30 and was packed. Even with 2 people making drinks/ordering, everyone got their drinks within 5 min. They even had time to  refill their sample drink: Love Potion #9. If you're not looking for milk tea, love potion #9 is a green apple flavored tea mixed with peach flavored tea. Looks like the place has free wifi, but a quick scan wasn't able to locate any outlets. If this place is packed, it can get noisy.

data.title: Good Iced Tea and Food Entrees.
data.text: Ten Ren's is known for serving Taiwanese Tea.  My wife, our 2 grandchildren and me only ordered the Iced Tea as well as Milk Icee.  We love it, most specially our 2 grandchildren, a 10-year and 7-year "young" kids.  We were there for afternoon tea, so we ordered some snack items.  They are delicious.

data.title: Pretty good
data.text: I really like this place for their Tapioca Milk Tea.  Next to some other places around here, e.g. Half and Half, this place is reasonably good and the prices are decent.  The staff is super friendly and the drinks taste good.  The line is reasonable too.

data.title: Lunch
data.text: Their side dish is terrible. Their shave ice is fair. But the food in the restaurant is pricy. Last time I ordered a chicken fillet rice, the chicken is ok, but the side dish is terrible.

data.title: 消夜的好選擇
data.text: 從拉斯維加斯回洛杉磯已很晚　連稻香也快關了　所以轉到天仁吃東西，滑蛋牛肉飯蠻好吃的　雖然口味偏鹹一點　但是拯救了飢腸轆轆的我，　芒果蜜桃茶也很好喝　有機會會再去！
